#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
map<string,string>names;
int main()
{
int test;cin>>test;int t=0;
int n;int i;string str,vote;
for(t=0;t<test;t++)
{
cin>>n;
names.clear();
	for(i=0;i<n;i++)
	{
	cin>>str>>vote;
	names[str]=vote;
	}
	map<string,string>:: iterator it;
	int result=0;
	for(it=names.begin();it!=names.end();it++)
	{
	if (it->second=="+")
	{
	result++;
	}
	else
	result--;
	}
cout<<result<<"\n";
}//test	








	return 0;
}
